PHRASE.LANG: Horse masks are out, Toro is in. [#Legal]
Exit les masques de chevaux, place au masque de Toro ! [#Legal]
Pferdemasken sind out, aber Toro ist in. [#Legal]
Le maschere da cavallo sono out, quelle da Toro sono in. [#Legal]
Ya no se llevan las máscaras de caballo, se llevan las de Toro. [#Legal]
Horse masks are out, Toro is in. [#Legal]
